00050 template <class _Traits> bool mfOffWriter<_Traits>::write(sMesh* malha, const char *filename)
00051 {
00052         MF_ASSERT(filename);
00053         MF_ASSERT(malha);       
00054         
00055         ofstream pf(filename);
00056         
00057         if( pf.is_open())
00058         {
00059                         if(! writer(pf, malha))
00060                                 return false;
00061                 
00062                         pf.close();
00063         }
00064         else
00065                 return false;
00066         
00067         return true;
00068 }

00070 template <class _Traits> bool mfOffWriter<_Traits>::writer(ofstream &pf, sMesh* malha)
00071 {
00072         int i = 0,j;
00073         sCell cell;
00074         
00075         pf << "OFF" << endl;
00076         pf << malha->getNumberOfVertices() << " ";
00077         pf << malha->getNumberOfCells() << " ";
00078         pf << "0" << endl;
00079         
00080         mfVerticesIterator<_Traits> itv(malha);
00081         
00082         mfVector<ids,ids> nvids(malha->getBlockSize());
00083         i = 0;
00084         for(itv.initialize(); itv.notFinish(); ++itv)
00085         {
00086                 if (sVertex::getDimension() == 2)
00087                         pf << setprecision(15) << itv->getCoord(0) << " " << setprecision(15) << itv->getCoord(1) << " 0.0" << endl;
00088                 else if (sVertex::getDimension() == 3)
00089                         pf << setprecision(15) << itv->getCoord(0) << " " << setprecision(15) << itv->getCoord(1) << " " << setprecision(15) << itv->getCoord(2) << endl;
00090 
00091                 nvids[&itv] = i++;
00092         }
00093         
00094         mfCellsIterator<_Traits> itc(malha);
00095         
00096         for(itc.initialize(); itc.notFinish(); ++itc)
00097         {
00098                 pf << itc->getNumberVerticesInCell();
00099         
00100                 for(j = 0; j < itc->getNumberVerticesInCell(); j++)
00101                         pf << " " << nvids[itc->getVertexId(j)];
00102                 pf << endl;
00103         }
00104         
00105         return true;
00106 }
